physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient exhibited profound hypotension after thiamine infusion, with continued hypotension afterward.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Blood pressure improved two days later to 124/72 mm Hg, Heart rate 91 bpm sitting; after standing: Blood pressure 80/50 mm Hg, Heart rate 89 bpm. Patient could rise from seated position with minimal use of arms.
